entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Carman
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:57 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow late this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 30 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Windy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Cloudy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 1. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 9:28 PM CST Saturday 11 March 2023
